message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think you'll find it very valuable. How about $130?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $100. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I see you recognize the value of this product. How about we meet in the middle at $115?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering my budget constraints, I am willing to go up to $110 for the product. I hope this offer is acceptable.
